typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STOFF as string,
		MATNR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
ExpRelatedItem filter(!isNull(STOFF)) ~> Filter1
MARA derive(ItemRelationshipTypeId = 99999,
		ItemRelationshipNote = 'Hazardous Material') ~> ExpRelatedItem
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as string,
		RelatedItemSku as string,
		ItemRelationshipTypeId as integer,
		ItemRelationshipNote as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MATNR,
		RelatedItemSku = STOFF,
		ItemRelationshipTypeId,
		ItemRelationshipNote
	)) ~> RelatedItem
